name: Thinspace a0.0.0
description:
hi! 

this is the first version of thinspace!

thinspace is a game i have made, or well im making. it's in early alpha now (a0.0.0) but there will be more versions soon. if you like it so far(you wont), join my discord where i update regularly on the progress of thinspace.

story:

you are a guy with no features (white stickman lmao) who is on another planet searching for their friend who went to explore. you will meet strange things and yes)

**PLEASE DOWNLOAD AND READ THE BUGS AND CRASHES INFORMATION FILE FOR REASONS**

VERSIONS:
